attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app took a whole month to download. It took up all my storage space, and worst of all its such bad quality. I thought I would have been worth it but no the app glitches so I can only go on it for 10 seconds before it kicks me out. Not to even mention why is the app orange when I open it like I know the Trump orange and all but why?? If I could I would give this app 0 stars because it is so hard to use and navigate thru. Anyways I think you guys should take this off the App Store it is so unnecessary. Thank you.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I have heard about some minor problems when I downloaded this app but I decided to take my risks to support murica and itâ€™s leading orangutan. When I signed in to support the campaign, this horrible music played and summoned an army of fire ants in my neighborhood. The ant army proceeded to march into my house even after I did everything to try and stop them. The red army took my dog and carried her out the door to sacrifice her to their orange ramen haired leader as my family and I watched in utter despair and horror. I do not recommend this app especially if you have a small child, cat and or dog.
